events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit me well.
System identified the case as a refund request due to customer's return and refund inquiry.
The case has been assigned to customer service representative Sarah M. to handle the refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product was worn or damaged, so we can process your return quickly?
Thanks for your quick reply! My order number is 9876543210. The jacket is unused and in original packaging.
Thank you for the info. You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label I’m sending you now.
Great, thank you for the assistance and the prepaid label. I will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should be reflected in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund for your returned jacket and if you need any further assistance.
The refund case has been closed successfully. Thank you for contacting us, and have a great day!
